channel.title: Thinking Ahead on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Thinking Ahead on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China Is Building a Brain-Computer Interface Industry
item.description: A new policy document outlines China’s plan to create an internationally competitive BCI industry within five years, and proposes developing devices for both health and consumer uses.
